channel.title: WorldBuilder
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates

item.title: WorldBuilder 0.1.2+17
item.description:
## What's Changed * 17 terraintype selection for landscape tools shouldnt show roadtype texture by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/21 * chore: new changelog generation by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/22 * fix: wire up settings by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/23 * History snapshots - closes #24 by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/25 * hitting the history limit no longer causes data loss. Fixes #26 by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/27 * update latest tag before generating changelog by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/28 * more edge changelog by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/29 * Add a setting for history limit: closes #30 by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/31 * clean up compilation warnings, add json source generator, more aot / trimming friendly by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/32 * Static obj prep by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/35 * Fix truncation of version string in desktop app by @amoeba in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/38 * Make WorldBuilder.Desktop run on macOS by @amoeba in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/37 * Fix rendering errors and bugs on macOS by @amoeba in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/39 * Platform projects by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/40 * Windows installer / opengl fixes by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/41 * Fix Linux rendering by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/42 * Add layers support by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/43
## New Contributors * @amoeba made their first contribution in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/38
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/compare/v0.1.1...latest

item.title: WorldBuilder 0.1.1
item.description:
### ðŸ“‹ Changelog
- Fix bug where project creation failed if default projects directory didn't exist. - Fix various auto updater issues. - App now forces check for updates on startup. - Fix default install path missing a directory separator.
